newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - April 7.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - April 7.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Saudi fines outlets 980,000 riyals in fines for copyright violations during a nine-month period.
- Saudi Arabia's Al-Rajhi Banking and Investment Corp launches a fund for the Egyptian stock market with minimum subscription fixed at $20,000.
- Visiting French trade team examines investments, joint ventures in Saudi.
- Saudi Real Estate Fund gives 1,794 loans worth 491 million riyals to citizens.
- Saudi Arabia spent around 70 billion riyals on expansion projects in Islam's holiest shrines in the kingdom.
